post:
Hi all,

we have limited stock available for this new special deal! All our offerings are based in Frankfurt, Germany and all inbound traffic is going through Voxilitys Anti DDoS protection.

The host systems for this deal will be based on E5-1650v2 CPUs, 128 GB ECC RAM and Pure SSD Storage (Samsung 850 Pros in RAID). Servers are available instantly after payment and only need around 15 seconds to be deployed.

**Special Plan**  
- 2 vCPU Cores @ 3.5 GHz  
- 512 MB ECC RAM  
- 15 GB Pure SSD Storage  
- 500 GB Traffic / month @ 1 Gbps port  
- 12 EUR per year  
**[ORDER NOW >](https://cloud.nodion.com/machines/new?code=5RAFVAVPTJ&plan_id=72)**

Pricing in EUR. Excludes any applicable tax. Additional traffic is charged at 0,02 EUR / GB.

Ignore the "page not found" message on the checkout page and please make sure to select the yearly plan.

Chat with us:  
https://www.nodion.com/en/ (bottom right corner)
